data.title: TANK MAGAZINE
data.meta_description: A thing of beauty and permanence in an age of transience. Since 1998.
data.text:
TANK MAGAZINE | The Aura Issue, Spring 2008 | Issue 43 | BUY THIS ISSUE

fronting

SECRET SIBLINGS: The mysterious duo behind Marsèll’s leathercraft

WAR AND PEAS: tank.tv visits the Middle East

SMART MOVE: a new home for the people behind Smart Car

BIG BAND THEORY: the underground art of the large Hadron Collider

AMERICAN GOTHIC: Mercedes Helwein’s debut

ABOUT FACE: rejoice! Calvin Klein’s beauty range is back

NIP TUCK: society is the spectacle at Art Basel Miami Beach

THE HOUSE THAT JEAN BUILT: Jean Prouvé’s Maison Tropicale settles on the bank of the Thames

MUSSEL MAN: Simon Sterling examines the zebra mussel’s colonisation of Toronto

RHINESTONE COWBOY: America’s personal museums of the bizarre

PRESSING ISSUES: Alfredo Jaar on how Africa is covered in Western media

BIGGER THAN THE BIBLE: Kate, Jerry and Naomi show that god things come in big packages

QUEENS REIGN SUPREME: M.I.A. passes the baton to Philly’s pop princess, Santogold

LABYRINTHS: Dirty Projector’s rework Black Flag’s Damaged from memory

ROLL UP: from Guantanamo to Eno, Riz Ahmed tears up the stage

CUFFS AND COLLARS: Fuck Buttons blast their nihilistic beat way pat 11

DOWN WITH THE DEATH SET: Joe And Will Ask? Gets sucked in by east London electricity

OVER THE RAINBOW: Black Kids follow the yellow brick road to pop success

features

SEXYTIME: Pleasureboy musician Sebastien Tellier and his muse

FIND THE GAP: Wolfgang Tillmans studio space salutes forgotten greats

FUNNY GAMES: a riddle for Yayoi Kusama by Terence Koh

GRAND MASTER: visionary polymath Alejandro Jodorowsky – filmmaker, mystic, magician and high priest of the surreal

GRILS ON FILM: Anne Collier’s revealing re-photographs

BELLY OF THE BEAST: inside the UN

BLOCK OF THE NEW: sanaa’s new museum brightens the bowery

HEDGE FUND: Valerie Stahl’s bankers in the forest

MEET MARKET: Shamim Momin on her female-focused Whitney Biennial

GYPSY KINGS: Frida Gianni welcomes us aboard the Gucci Bordello

PRINCE AND THE NEW POWER GENERATION: photography by Dirk Seiden Schwan, styling by Chloe Kerman

LIVE AND WET GUY: photography by Pierre Bjork, styling by Richard Pierce

REFLECTIVE GLORY: by Georgina Graham, photography by David Dunan

WHITE NIGHTS: photography by Dirk Seiden Schwan, fashion editor Azza Yousif

DOORS OF PERCEPTION: by Chloe Kerman, photography by Jamie Isaia

LOVE IN THE AFTERNOON: by Jo Barker, photography by Bruna Kazinoti

fashion

talk

flash-fiction
